noun.description: A light placed at the side of something.
examples: a designer village with sidelights along the pathways

noun.description: A narrow window or pane of glass set alongside a door or larger window.
examples: we added French doors with sidelights and a fanlight overhead

noun.description: A piece of incidental information that helps to clarify or enliven a subject.
examples: one has to wade through pages of extraneous material in order to discover these sidelights on the management of an estate
